snippet.title: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania | World-Class Museums and Three Scenic Rivers
snippet.description: Boasting the museums and cultural attractions of a city twice its size, plus fun boat rides, relaxing river walks, and exciting sports teams, Pittsburgh is a perfect vacation spot for families.
